amendatorysection.catchline: Jury commissioner in counties over 200,000 population; salary increase, when effective.
amendatorysection.para: Section 25-1626 shall be so interpreted as to effectuate its general purpose, to provide, in the public interest, adequate compensation as therein provided for the jury commissioner, and to permit a change in such salary as soon as same may become operative under the Constitution of the State of Nebraska.
